body.name: Shoe Rack, 9 Tiers Tall Shoe Rack, 36-40 Pairs Shoe Organizer with Nonwoven Fabric Cover, Double Row Black Shoe Rack for Closet (Black Rack with Gray Cover)
features: △PRACTICAL DESIGN: This 9-layer shoe storage adopts a double-row structure design. There are four steel pipes in one layer, which greatly improves the load-bearing capacity and overall structural stability of the product. At the same time, this shoe rack can also be assembled into a single row with some accessories to adapt to the narrow space.

△SPACE MASTER: This 9-tier shoe rack organizer can hold 36 pairs of shoes (4 pairs per floor) with large size: 35"x12.5"x62.2", it keeping your limited space such as entryway, closet, cloakroom, bedroom, etc., in order.
△DIY FUNCTION: The height of each shelf is 6.7", and it can be disassembled at will, you can remove one layer to store boots, heels, or other larger accessories.

△POWERFUL CONNECTOR: When removing the dust cover, you can adjust the height of the shoe rack to two, three or four layers at will through the powerful two-way eight-hole design plastic interface. At the same time, you can also change the width of the shoe rack to a single-row, double-row, three-row or even four-row structure.

△DUSTPROOF COVER AND EXTRA STORAGE PORKETS: You can zip up the cover of this shoe shelf to keep dust off your shoes; Pockets on the sides of the dust cover add extra storage space and can be used to store light items such as keys, socks and slippers.

△EASY TO ASSEMBLE: No tools required, just connect the plastic connectors to complete the installation. Before installation, please check whether the accessories are complete according to the manual, and then assemble, which can save your precious time and make the installation go smoothly.

△ABOUT DISASSEMBLY: In order to strengthen the stability of the shoe shelf, the plastic interface will be more compact in design. Please remove slowly and carefully to prevent damage to the connector.
△100% SATISFACTION: Please keep in touch with us if you have any questions about our product, we will attempt to resolve it and ensure your 100% satisfaction. Don’t hesitate to own it!

△WARM TIPS: When installing the shoe shelves, please make sure that all parts are tightly pressed without leaving any space. And it would be more steadier if you put the heavy objects at the bottom layer.
body.description: SPECIFICATIONS: - Material: High-quality PP Connectors, Non-woven Fabric cover, Durable Iron Pipes - Color: Gray - Layer Height: 6.7" - Assembly Required: Yes - Product Size: 35"x12.5"x62.2" - Weight: 10.36lb Package Contents: - 1 x 9-Tier Shoe Rack - 1 x Dustproof cover - 1 x Instruction

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The flexible and unique design of this HODYANN 9 Tiers Shoe Rack with Non-woven Fabric Cover can satisfy your various requirement of storage in the daily life. It is really a powerful product to make your living space more comfortable and tidy, so that you should enjoy your better life at home.

HODYANN MANUFACTURER: HODYANN is a home furniture manufacturer, which means Home and You. Our company is committed to a variety of practical economic products that provide home storage solutions, simple, fashionable and innovative, to give you a more comfortable space, is our ultimate goal to create all products. Thank you very much for choosing HODYANN, believe me, after purchasing, our story has just begun! SPECIFICATIONS: - Material: High-quality PP Connectors, Non-woven Fabric cover, Durable Iron Pipes - Color: Gray - Layer Height: 6.7" - Assembly Required: Yes - Product Size: 35"x12.5"x62.2" - Weight: 10.36lb Package Contents: - 1 x 9-Tier Shoe Rack - 1 x Dustproof cover - 1 x Instruction

NOTES: - When receiving the product, please confirm the accessories according to the listing of instructions. Once you find less pieces, please provide relevant pictures. We will deal it in the time. - Please follow the instruction when assembling. - In order to strengthen the stability of the shoe shelf, the plastic interface will be more compact in design. Please remove slowly and carefully to prevent damage to the connector. - It is recommended to heat the plastic connector with a hair dryer for a few minutes before assembly (especially in the cold winter months). This will make the assembly works easier and protect the connectors. - When installing the shoe shelves, please make sure that all parts are tightly pressed without leaving any space. And it would be more steadier if you put the heavy objects at the bottom layer. - Please Keep out of the sun to prevent the fabric from deteriorating and to prolong its life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had to watch a video on YouTube to put together. But it’s easy. This is the best thing I’ve ordered this year on Amazon. My bedroom closet is so organized. Will get another one

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: That i can adjust the size. 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Another deceiving product from Amazon! The alleged dust cover is not long enough to cover all the way! They should NOT call it dust cover! Dust will come in for sure from the bottom. It would work if I do not set up the one of the tiers. But that would defeat the purpose of buying the products because of the size and dust cover description!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It was missing pieces but I just keep it because I didn't feel like taking it apart for return/exchange just to have another one with same issue buyers beware.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not to sturdy and starts to break
